name: The Night Santa Went Crazy
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys + z and x

or

w, a, s, and d + Mouse Buttons

Level 1

Deliver gifts to the nice kids and bomb the houses of the naughty ones!

Level 2

Santa's elves have gone rogue! Shoot them down with your bazooka while bombing passersby.

Level 3

??????? Santa tries out his favorite new "toy".

Made in 72 hours for the Lost Cartridge Jam 4
